NPC.NAME: NPC Name
NPC.SKILLS_INFO: NPCs don't roll dice. They have predefined result thresholds.
NPC.NO_TARGET_SELECTED: No target selected. Please target a token before attacking.
NPC.DEFENSE_ROLL_REQUIRED: Target must make a defense roll

VEHICLE.NAME: Vehicle/Drone Name
VEHICLE.SELECT_TYPE_FIRST: Please select a vehicle type first
VEHICLE.ONLY_WEAPONS_ALLOWED: Only weapons can be added to vehicles
VEHICLE.NARRATIVE_EFFECTS_HINT: Each narrative effect costs 5000¥ (except if value is 0)
VEHICLE.NO_NARRATIVE_EFFECTS: No narrative effects. Click the button above to add one.
VEHICLE.RR_LIST_HINT: Risk reduction applied to all drone rolls

ATTRIBUTES.LABEL: Attributes
ATTRIBUTES.AUTOPILOT_DESC: Used alone as dice pool when the drone is autonomous
ATTRIBUTES.STRUCTURE_DESC: Rough measure of the vehicle's size, used similarly to Strength for characters
ATTRIBUTES.ARMOR_DESC: Used to resist damage, similarly to Armor for characters
ATTRIBUTES.HANDLING_DESC: Vehicle's ability to take tight and fast turns. Used during chases
ATTRIBUTES.SPEED_DESC: Vehicle's speed and acceleration. Used during chases

ICE.NAME: ICE Name
ICE.SELECT_TYPE_FIRST: Please select an ICE type first

ATTRIBUTES.LABEL: Attributes
ATTRIBUTES.SERVER_INDEX_DESC: Determines the success threshold (equal to server index)
ATTRIBUTES.THRESHOLD_DESC: Number of successes on tests (equal to server index)
ATTRIBUTES.DAMAGE_VALUE_DESC: DV calculated according to ICE type

DESCRIPTION.LABEL: Description
DESCRIPTION.PATROL: Analyzes personas connected to the server. Perception (matrix) test opposed to Stealth (matrix stealth) + Logic of the decker.
DESCRIPTION.ACID: Each successful attack reduces the target's Firewall by 1 for the duration of the Scene (no damage dealt).
DESCRIPTION.BLASTER: Connection lock (target cannot disconnect for one turn) + matrix damage, DV = Server Index/2 (rounded up).
DESCRIPTION.BLOCKER: Each successful attack reduces the target's Attack by 1 for the duration of the Scene (no damage dealt).
DESCRIPTION.BLACK: Biofeedback damage, DV = Server Index/2 (rounded up).
DESCRIPTION.GLUE: Connection lock (target cannot disconnect for one turn, no damage dealt).
DESCRIPTION.TRACKER: Discovers the physical location of the target (no damage dealt).

ATTACK.LABEL: Attack
ATTACK.HINT: Select a target token on the scene, then click this button to launch an attack.
ATTACK.NO_TARGET: Please select a target token on the scene.
ATTACK.CANNOT_ATTACK: This ICE type cannot attack directly.

COMBAT.WAITING_FOR_DEFENSE: {attacker} attacks {defender} with {successes} successes. Waiting for defense...
COMBAT.DEFENSE_BLOCKS_ATTACK: {defender} blocks the attack! ({defenseSuccesses} defense successes > {attackSuccesses} attack successes)

COUNTER_ATTACK.TITLE: Counter-Attack - Weapon Selection
COUNTER_ATTACK.SELECT_WEAPON: Select a weapon for the counter-attack:
COUNTER_ATTACK.NO_WEAPON_SELECTED: Please select a weapon for the counter-attack
COUNTER_ATTACK.NO_DICE_POOL: The dice pool for the counter-attack is 0. Please select a valid weapon.

COMBAT.DAMAGE_OVERFLOW_LIGHT: Light wounds full, applied as severe
COMBAT.DAMAGE_OVERFLOW_SEVERE: Severe wounds full, applied as incapacitating
COMBAT.CANNOT_FIND_TARGET: Cannot find target to apply damage

SRA2.CONFIRM_DELETE: Are you sure you want to delete {name}?

CHAT.INVALID_DICE_COUNT: Please enter a valid dice count

FEATS.LABEL: Feats
FEATS.NAME: Feat Name
FEATS.IS_FIRST_FEAT_HINT: Check this box if this is the character's first trait (traits only: costs 0 at level 0, otherwise costs 3)
FEATS.VEHICLE_ALREADY_EXISTS: The vehicle {name} is already on this character
FEATS.ONLY_FEATS: Only feat items can be dropped in the feats section
FEATS.RR_TARGET_PLACEHOLDER: Name or ID of target object
FEATS.DROP_TARGET_HERE: Drag & drop a skill or specialization here
FEATS.MUST_BE_ON_ACTOR: The feat must be on a character to link a target
FEATS.TARGET_NOT_ON_ACTOR: This target is not on the character
FEATS.TARGET_NOT_FOUND_ON_ACTOR: This target does not exist on the current character
FEATS.WRONG_TARGET_TYPE: Wrong target type. Drag a skill or specialization according to the selected RR type
FEATS.WRONG_TARGET_TYPE_SPECIFIC: Wrong target type. This RR expects a {expected}
FEATS.DROP_IN_RR_ZONE: Drop the item in a specific RR drop zone
FEATS.SEARCH_TARGET_PLACEHOLDER: Search for a skill or specialization...
FEATS.BONUS_PHYSICAL_THRESHOLD_HINT: Bonus to physical damage thresholds (positive or negative)
FEATS.BONUS_MENTAL_THRESHOLD_HINT: Bonus to mental damage thresholds (positive or negative)
FEATS.BONUS_MATRIX_THRESHOLD_HINT: Bonus to matrix damage thresholds (positive or negative)
FEATS.ARMOR_VALUE_HINT: Armor value granted by this armor (0-5). Armor values stack together (maximum 5).
FEATS.BONUS_ANARCHY_HINT: Additional anarchy points granted by this feat
FEATS.RECOMMENDED_LEVEL_HINT: Automatically calculated based on feat properties and bonuses
FEATS.RIGGER_CONSOLE_COUNT_HINT: Number of drone controllers (adds +1 per controller to recommended level)
FEATS.HAS_VEHICLE_CONTROL_WIRING_HINT: Grants vehicle control wiring (adds +2 to recommended level)
FEATS.IS_WEAPON_FOCUS_HINT: This weapon is a focus (adds +1 to recommended level)
FEATS.IS_ADEPT_POWER_WEAPON_HINT: This weapon is an adept power (adds +1 to recommended level)
FEATS.IS_BIOWARE_HINT: If checked, the feat cost is +1 additional level
FEATS.CHOICE_OPTIONS_HINT: Configuration of options when dropping a token with this feat
FEATS.IS_OPTIONAL_HINT: This feat is optional and can be deactivated when creating the token
FEATS.IS_A_CHOICE_HINT: This feat is part of a choice list when creating the token
FEATS.NUMBER_OF_CHOICE_HINT: Number of feats to choose from those marked as choices
FEATS.CHOICE_DIALOG_OPTIONAL_HINT: Activate optional feats you want to use
FEATS.CHOICE_DIALOG_WRONG_COUNT: You must select exactly {expected} feat(s), you selected {actual}
FEATS.NO_RR_ENTRIES: No risk reduction entries. Click the button above to add one.
FEATS.NARRATIVE_EFFECT_PLACEHOLDER: Describe a narrative effect of this feat...
FEATS.NARRATIVE_EFFECT_NEGATIVE_HINT: Check this box if the effect is negative for the character (disadvantage, curse, etc.)
FEATS.NARRATIVE_EFFECT_VALUE_HINT: Choose the penalty value (-1 to -5) for this negative narrative effect
FEATS.NARRATIVE_EFFECT_VALUE_POSITIVE_HINT: Choose the bonus value (+1 to +5) for this positive narrative effect
FEATS.NO_NARRATIVE_EFFECTS: No narrative effects. Click the button above to add one.
FEATS.GRANTS_NARRATION_HINT: This feat grants a narration (adds to narration count)
FEATS.NARRATION_ACTIONS_HINT: Number of actions this narration grants (1 or 2)
FEATS.SUSTAINED_SPELLS_HINT: Each checked box allows maintaining one additional spell (max +2) and adds +2 to recommended level
FEATS.SUMMONED_SPIRIT_HINT: Allows summoning one additional spirit (max +1) and adds +3 to recommended level
FEATS.WEAPON_DAMAGE_BONUS_HINT: Damage Value bonus applied to weapons of the selected type
FEATS.WEAPON_TYPE_BONUS_HINT: Weapon type required for the bonus to apply

POWER.SECTION_HINT: Configure the skills and specializations for attack and defense of the power. The attack skill is used for the dice roll.

WEAPON.NEEDS_ACTOR_FOR_CALCULATION: Add this weapon to a character to calculate the final value with Strength (FOR)
WEAPON.DAMAGE_VALUE_BONUS_HINT: Each checked box adds +1 to DV and +1 to recommended level
WEAPON.LINKED_ATTACK_SKILL_HINT: Skill used to attack with this weapon (ex: 'Ranged Weapons', 'Close Combat')
WEAPON.LINKED_ATTACK_SPECIALIZATION_HINT: Attack specialization (ex: 'Spec: Pistols', 'Spec: Blades'). Prefix with 'Spec: '
WEAPON.LINKED_DEFENSE_SPECIALIZATION_HINT: Defense specialization (ex: 'Spec: Ranged Defense', 'Spec: Defense'). Prefix with 'Spec: '

TYPES.SHORT_WEAPONS: Short Weapons (knife, brass knuckles, cyber claws and blades)
TYPES.LONG_WEAPONS: Long Weapons (sword, rapier, katana, combat axe, polearm, club, telescopic baton)
TYPES.ADVANCED_MELEE: Advanced Melee Weapons (stun baton, shock gloves)
TYPES.THROWING: Throwing Weapons (throwing knife, shuriken, chakram, tomahawk)
TYPES.POCKET_PISTOLS: Pocket Pistols (Fichetti Tiffani Needler, Streetline special, Walther Palm Pistol)
TYPES.LIGHT_PISTOLS: Light Pistols (Ares Light Fire, Beretta 101T, Colt America L36, Fichetti Security 600, Ruger Redhawk)
TYPES.AUTOMATIC_PISTOLS: Automatic Pistols (Ares Crusader II, Ceska Black Scorpion, Steyr TMP, Ares Super Squirt*)
TYPES.HEAVY_PISTOLS: Heavy Pistols (Ares Viper Slivergun, Browning Ultra Power, Colt Manhunter)
TYPES.SMGS: Submachine Guns (Colt Cobra, HK-227, FN P93 Praetor, Uzi V)
TYPES.ASSAULT_RIFLES: Assault Rifles (AK-97, Colt M23, FN HAR, Parashield DART rifle*)
TYPES.SHOTGUNS: Shotguns (Defiance T-250, Mossberg CMDT, Remington Roomsweeper)
TYPES.GRENADE_LAUNCHERS: Grenade Launchers** (Ares Antioch II, ArmTech MGL-6 & 12)

WEAPON.CLICK_TO_ROLL: Click to attack with this weapon

SPELL.SECTION_HINT: Spells use the base feat properties (narrative effects, bonuses, etc.) without weapon characteristics.
SPELL.TYPE_HINT: Direct spells affect the target directly (mana), indirect spells go through physical effects (elemental)

VEHICLE.BONUSES_HINT: Each bonus adds +1 to recommended level (unless otherwise specified)
VEHICLE.IS_FIXED_HINT: The vehicle/drone is fixed and cannot move: -1 level
VEHICLE.WEAPON_MOUNT_IMPROVEMENT_HINT: Additional mount, hidden, turret, etc.: +1 level
VEHICLE.ADDITIONAL_DRONE_COUNT_HINT: Number of additional identical drones (max 3): +2 levels per drone

TYPES.MICRODRONE: Microdrone (Autopilot 6, Structure 0, Handling 10, Speed 0 (flying 1), Armor 0, no weapon mount)
TYPES.MINIDRONE: Minidrone (Autopilot 6, Structure 1, Handling 10, Speed 0 (flying 1), Armor 0, no weapon mount)
TYPES.SMALL_DRONE: Small drone (Autopilot 6, Structure 1, Handling 9, Speed 2 (flying 4), Armor 0, SMG max)
TYPES.MEDIUM_DRONE: Medium drone (Autopilot 6, Structure 2, Handling 7, Speed 3 (flying 6), Armor 0, rifle max)
TYPES.LARGE_DRONE: Large drone (Autopilot 6, Structure 4, Handling 4, Speed 4 (flying 8), Armor 0)
TYPES.RACING_MOTORCYCLE: Racing motorcycle (Autopilot 6, Structure 4, Handling 2, Speed 6, Armor 0, rifle max)
TYPES.OFFROAD_MOTORCYCLE: Off-road motorcycle (Autopilot 6, Structure 4, Handling 3, Speed 5, Armor 0, rifle max)
TYPES.CHOPPER: Chopper (Autopilot 6, Structure 5, Handling 2, Speed 5, Armor 0, rifle max)
TYPES.SPORTS_CAR: Sports car (Autopilot 6, Structure 5, Handling 2, Speed 5, Armor 0)
TYPES.SUV_PICKUP: SUV / Pickup (Autopilot 6, Structure 7, Handling 1, Speed 4, Armor 0)
TYPES.BUS_TRUCK: Bus / Semi-trailer (Autopilot 6, Structure 10, Handling 0, Speed 2, Armor 0)
TYPES.RIGID_INFLATABLE_BOAT: Rigid inflatable boat (Autopilot 6, Structure 5, Handling 4, Speed 3, Armor 0)
TYPES.CIVIL_HELICOPTER: Civil helicopter (Autopilot 6, Structure 9, Handling 4, Speed 6, Armor 0)

CYBERDECK.BONUS_LIGHT_DAMAGE_HINT: Adds +1 to the cyberdeck's number of light damage boxes (from 2 to 3) and increases the feat's recommended cost by +3

AWAKENED.SHAMANIC_MASK_HINT: Reduces the feat level by 1 when activated

SKILLS.LABEL: Skills
SKILLS.NAME: Skill Name
SKILLS.ONLY_SKILLS: Only skill items can be dropped in the skills section
SKILLS.NO_DICE: This skill has no dice to roll
SKILLS.DRAIN_MINOR_COMPLICATION: The character suffers a disadvantage to all their magical activities until the end of their next narration.
SKILLS.DRAIN_CRITICAL_COMPLICATION: The character suffers a light wound due to drain.
SKILLS.DRAIN_DISASTER: The character suffers an incapacitating wound due to drain.

SPECIALIZATIONS.LABEL: Specializations
SPECIALIZATIONS.NAME: Specialization Name
SPECIALIZATIONS.NO_DICE: This specialization has no dice to roll
SPECIALIZATIONS.ONLY_SPECIALIZATIONS: Only specialization items can be dropped in the specializations section
SPECIALIZATIONS.SKILL_NOT_ON_ACTOR: This skill is not on the character
SPECIALIZATIONS.ONLY_SKILLS_CAN_BE_LINKED: Only skills can be linked to specializations
SPECIALIZATIONS.MUST_BE_ON_ACTOR: The specialization must be on a character to link skills
SPECIALIZATIONS.SKILL_LINKED: {name} has been linked to this specialization

METATYPES.TITLE: Metatype
METATYPES.LABEL: Metatype
METATYPES.NAME: Metatype Name
METATYPES.ANARCHY_BONUS_HINT: Anarchy bonus added to the base of 3 (default: 0)
METATYPES.DRAG_DROP: Drag and drop a metatype here
METATYPES.ONLY_METATYPES: Only metatype items can be dropped in the metatypes section
METATYPES.ONLY_ONE_METATYPE: A character can have only one metatype

MIGRATION.EXECUTING: Executing migration {code}: version {currentVersion} is lower than {targetVersion}
MIGRATION.DONE: Migrations done, system version will change to {version}
MIGRATION.NOT_NEEDED: No migration needed, system version will change to {version}
MIGRATION.13_0_5_INFO: Migration 13.0.5: Weapon and Spell feat types have been separated. All feats have been converted to "Weapon" type. You can manually change spells to "Spell" type.
MIGRATION.13_0_7_INFO: Migration 13.0.7: {count} "Weapons & Spells" feat(s) converted to "Weapon" type. All data preserved with backup.
MIGRATION.13_0_8_INFO: Migration 13.0.8: Narrative effects on {count} feat(s) have been converted to the new format (with negative option).
MIGRATION.13_0_9_INFO: Migration 13.0.9: {count} feat(s) have been updated - added value field to narrative effects and 'first feat' field to {firstFeatCount} feat(s).
MIGRATION.13_0_10_INFO: Migration 13.0.10: {count} feat(s) updated - simplified cost system (free 0¥, equipment 2500¥, advanced 5000¥). {specializedCount} specialized equipment converted to advanced, {featCount} feat(s) converted.
MIGRATION.13_0_11_INFO: Migration 13.0.11: {count} weapon(s) updated - added linked specialization fields for attack and defense.
MIGRATION.13_0_12_INFO: Migration 13.0.12: {count} weapon(s) updated - 'dice' ranges converted to 'disadvantage'.

THEME.TITLE: UI Theme
THEME.DESC: Choose the visual theme for the system user interface.

ANARCHY_COUNTER.TITLE: Group Anarchy
ANARCHY_COUNTER.SETTING_HINT: Anarchy points shared by the group, controlled by the GM.
ANARCHY_COUNTER.GM_ONLY: Only the GM can modify Group Anarchy

ROLL_DIALOG.TITLE: Dice Roll
ROLL_DIALOG.RANGE_INVALID: Invalid range - Please select a valid range
ROLL_DIALOG.INVALID_RANGE: The selected range is not available for this weapon. Please select a valid range.

RR.PHANTOM_TOOLTIP: RR available without skill - rolls on attribute
